Module com.um_project_golf
Package com.um_project_golf.Core

Class ShaderManager

java.lang.Object
com.um_project_golf.Core.ShaderManager
public class ShaderManager extends Object
The shader manager class. This class is responsible for creating and managing the shaders of the game.
